metadata.name: Tell Me
metadata.shortDescription: Lightweight knowledge retrieval from existing artifacts with smart fallback to analysis
metadata.description: Search-first knowledge retrieval that searches existing documentation in .olaf/data/product/ and .olaf/data/practices/ before suggesting which analysis skill to run if no artifacts are found.
objectives: Search existing artifacts in product and practices folders
Return answers from found documentation with source citations
Suggest appropriate analysis skill if no documentation exists
Provide fast responses without unnecessary analysis
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

prompts.name: tell-me
prompts.description: Main prompt for knowledge retrieval and search

skill_dependencies.name: onboard-me
skill_dependencies.description: Suggested when project documentation doesn't exist
